00019 // default value for backlog of HttpServerSocket when listening
00020 #define APOXI_HTTPSERVER_DEFAULT_BACKLOG 15
00021 
00022 // default maximum of currently connected clients
00023 #define APOXI_HTTPSERVER_DEFAULT_MAX_USERS 5

00032 // used ASCII codes
00033 #define HTTPSERVER_ASCII_LF 10 // line feed
00034 #define HTTPSERVER_ASCII_CR 13 // carriage return
00035 #define HTTPSERVER_ASCII_SP 32 // blank space ' '
00036 #define HTTPSERVER_ASCII_QM 63 // question mark '?'

00040 #define HTTPSERVER_ASCII_DOT    46 // dot '.'
00041 #define HTTPSERVER_ASCII_SL 47 // forward slash '/'
00042 #define HTTPSERVER_ASCII_PL 43 // plus sign '+'

00044 /* Commands used internally by HttpServer to keep public interface but 
00045     initialize SocketHandler in the right ExecutionContext.
00046 */
00047 enum HttpServiceCommand {
00048     c_http_service_command_init,
00049     c_http_service_command_terminate,
00050     c_http_service_command_start,
00051     c_http_service_command_stop
00052 };
00053 
00054 enum HttpServiceCommandError {
00055     c_http_service_command_error_success,
00056     c_http_service_command_error_failed
00057 };
00058 
00059 // return codes for HttpRequest-handling methods
00060 enum HttpResponseCode {
00061     c_http_response_code_200,   // OK
00062     c_http_response_code_400,   // Bad request
00063     c_http_response_code_404    // Not found
00064 };
